overview:
José is founder of HopIn, the “world’s easiest sharing platform” for mobile devices. People can share images, videos or entire websites, through intuitive gestures.

He is also current board member of Chilefilms S.A. the most important audio visual service company in Latam, with offices and Labs in Argentina, Brazil, Peru, Colombia and Mexico.

Previously, José was an associate at Perez de Arce Abogados, law firm based in Chile, where he focused in Tax and Corporate and Business law.
